Interface ArgumentBinder.BindingResult<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Subinterfaces:
PendingRequestBindingResult<T>
Enclosing interface:
ArgumentBinder<T,S>
public static interface ArgumentBinder.BindingResult<T>
The result of binding.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
